title: hello i got banned permanently without a 14 day ban before?
body: Hello my account smurfornotsmurf was banned PERMANENTLY WITH NO 14 day BAN and I do not know why, well I do realize I was toxic but I did not receive a 14-day ban ever BEFORE ON THIS ACCOUNT please help me guys I was being toxic to a Caitlyn who went adc when he didn't get the lane went duo top with me when I said please don't and after I got tiked off and started flaming my team im sorry and know im wrong but no 14 day ban before im pretty sure thats not how it works and no its not because I inted because I was 8/9 at the end of the game I believe. Please give me feedback and any way to retrieve my account.

Riot has no way of knowing whether you did it on purpose. You are responsible for anything that happens on your account.

If you could post a screen shot of what comes up when you log in, that could help a lot. As it stands there is inconsistency with your story. First you said you flamed, then it is your little brother played.

Also, there is a reply button at the bottom of the post to reply to someone specific. It notifies the other user when you use it.
punishment can be escalated if it gets bad enough and will skip tiers.
just uh paste ur logs here then we can judge

Hmm, you would need to submit a support ticket as it isn't usual to skip the 14 day. There are really only three possibilities for it.

1. You said some serious things. Like super excessive ZT ( zero tolerance) or actual real life threats.

2. Due to being low level and obviously a smurf, escalated punishment. (No hard backing on this. Based on observations only).

3. You actually had a 14 day ban and don't remember.

If youre on a smurf account, where you've had other accounts previously banned, they will enact harsher punishments on you. They do take into account your behavioral history on other accounts, evidence suggests. So since youre continuing to break the rules after previous permabans, they're gonna continue to permaban you until you stop breaking their rules. Thats at least the impression I get after reading several previous threads similar to yours. 

Oh, someone else was using your account. You may get escalated to a permaban for sharing accounts. I know you didnt intentionally "share" it, but thats just the term they use when someone else uses your account. You are responsible for that, unfortunately.
